title: City's First 'Net-Zero' Energy Efficient School Opens on Staten Island
text:
10 City's First 'Net-Zero' Energy Efficient School Opens on Staten Island 
DNAinfo: ROSSVILLE â€” A "net-zero" school that promises to produce as much energy as it consumes opened its doors for the first day of classes Wednesday after four years of planning and construction.
